title: Bilgewater event causing client to crash
body: after completing act 1 of the event ({{champion:4}}  4 lyf) this is what shows up, logged in multiple times and it doesnt change, just darkened and cant click anything

replies.body:
Hey tR Vorpalrend,

This may be caused by a variety of different issues. Can you first try [repairing your client](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article), and seeing if that resolves your issue?

Solved.
I really should have thought of doing that, but i couldnt be bothered xD
Thanks alot!
Hey! Great to hear! Thanks for checking back in and letting me know :)
